item.title: Committee
item.description: The committee op PION 2023 consists of: Diene van Batenburg - Chair Victor Vreede - Secretary Stella Dart√©e - Treasurer Noel Wallaart Jord Muffels Melvin Room Please feel free to reach out to us via pion@nsaweb.nl.

item.title: Rules
item.description: Teams A legitimate participation to PION 2023, abides the following rules: A team consists of at most four students. Both Bachelor and Master students are allowed. A team with one or more Master students is a Master team. General Rules It is not allowed to communicate (about the problems) by any means with anyone other than team members. It is allowed to use a scientific, graphical calculator (Ti-83, Ti-84 or a similar model).

item.title: Problems
item.description: Here are the problems and solutions of previous years’ PION. 2019: Problems and Answers 2018: Problems and Answers 2016: Problems and Answers 2015: Problems and Answers 2014: Problems and Answers 2013: Problems and Answers 2012: Problems and Answers

item.title: Contact
item.description: The committee is available for questions about the event via pion@nsaweb.nl. This year, PION is organised by the NSA. The pion takes place at Science Park, Amsterdam. The NSA is located at: Kamer A0.08 Science Park 904 1098XH Amsterdam The Netherlands
